Name: First Piece Down
Description: Place your first puzzle piece.

Name: Puzzle Initiate
Description: Complete your first puzzle of any size.

Name: Quick Game
Description: Solve a puzzle with fewer than 20 pieces.

Name: Photographer
Description: Solve a puzzle using a new photo from your camera.

Name: Curator
Description: Solve a puzzle using an image from your device's gallery.

Name: Apprentice
Description: Solve 10 puzzles.

Name: Journeyman
Description: Solve 25 puzzles.

Name: Veteran
Description: Solve 50 puzzles.

Name: Puzzle Master
Description: Solve 100 puzzles.

Name: Piece Collector
Description: Place a total of 1,000 pieces.

Name: Piece Enthusiast
Description: Place a total of 5,000 pieces.

Name: Marathoner
Description: Accumulate 10 hours of total playtime.

Name: Daily Ritual
Description: Open the game and play on 3 consecutive days.

Name: The Big Picture
Description: Solve a puzzle with over 100 pieces.

Name: Maximum Effort
Description: Solve a puzzle with the maximum number of pieces (143).

Name: Purist
Description: Solve a 100+ piece puzzle with both "Show image in background" and "Show puzzle grid" disabled.

Name: Silent Solver
Description: Solve a puzzle with the "Play Sounds" setting disabled.

Name: Speedster
Description: Solve a puzzle with 50+ pieces in under 3 minutes.

Name: Record Setter
Description: Beat your own personal best time for any difficulty.

Name: Top of the Charts
Description: Achieve the #1 high score for any difficulty level.

Name: I Like This One
Description: Set a completed puzzle as your phone wallpaper from the gallery.

Name: Show and Tell
Description: Use the share feature in the gallery.

Name: Welcome Back
Description: Load and continue a saved game from the main menu.

Name: To Be Continued...
Description: Press the "Download Puzzled Girls part 2" button.

Name: Window Shopper
Description: Press the "More apps like this" button.

Name: Globetrotter
Description: Start a game in three different languages.

Name: Night Owl
Description: Finish a puzzle between midnight and 4 AM.

Name: In the Zone
Description: Place 50 pieces correctly in a row without a mistake.

Name: Collector
Description: Unlock 10 different images in the rewards gallery.

Name: Gallery Complete
Description: Unlock all of the default bundled images.
